name: desktop
content:
desktop noun
(COMPUTING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 [ C ] a view on a computer screen that contains icons (= small symbols or pictures) representing files, programs, and other features of the computer: The menu bar with its windows is one of the features of the desktop.
Grassetto/iStock / Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
B2 [ C ] (also desktop computer) a type of computer that is able to fit on the top of a desk Compare
laptop
notebook (COMPUTER)
palmtop
Photographer is my life/Moment/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesClick the icon on your desktop to open the Cambridge Advanced Learner's Dictionary.Click here to download a screensaver for your desktop.She has a picture of her cat on her desktop.This software allows you to view the latest football scores on your desktop.Right-click anywhere on your desktop to change your screen settings.

More examplesFewer examplesI'm looking for a desktop machine for use at home. The desktop computer application aims to seamlessly integrate e-mail, instant messaging, videoconferencing, traditional phone service, and Internet-based calling.I finally wised up and created a desktop shortcut to System Properties. A new desktop search feature lets you locate information on your hard drive as easily as Google lets you find it on the web.

desktop adjective [not gradable]
(FOR USE IN ONE PLACE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
designed to be used on or at a desk, and not carried around: a desktop computer
desktop noun [C]
(WORK AREA)
the screen area of a personal computer when no programs are being used, or the top of a desk: A shortcut to the program will be created on your desktop.
Add to word list
Add to word list
the top of a desk: My desktop is too cluttered for me to be able to work efficiently.
IT a view on a computer screen which contains icons (= small symbols or pictures) that represent files, programs, and other features of the computer: The menu bar is one of the standard features of the desktop.
→
desktop computer
desktop adjective [ before noun ]
a desktop device/printer/system a desktop PC
